sentences.en: “The goal should be to make the villages livable, ” he said.
sentences.cn: 他说，“这个目标应该是使村庄适宜居住。

sentences.en: But now the origin and system of theories about livable city is still weak.

sentences.en: Ecological Livable City has become a new card of our city.

sentences.en: In many neighborhoods, someone forgot plan for that basic building block of livable cities, the sidewalk.

sentences.en: In other words, love comes into an imperfect world to make it livable.
sentences.cn: 也就是说, 因为爱才使这个不完美的世界变成了适合人类繁衍的地方.

sentences.en: Longwan District should actively foster livable should venture investment and business environment for development.

sentences.en: MCM wants to help see that this development is livable, sustainable and as beautiful as possible.
sentences.cn: MCM愿意帮助中国发展是宜居 、 可持续和尽善尽美的生活环境.

sentences.en: Since all the maid were good and livable from whence come the evil wives?

sentences.en: The overall area of this apartment is 95 square meters , 80 percent of it being livable.

sentences.en: Two of its cities - Munich ( pictured ) and Berlin - are often ranked among the most livable in the world.
sentences.cn: 德国的两座城市慕尼黑 ( 图中所示 ) 和柏林常被囊括在世界最宜居住的城市中.
